segments.text: This entire scene is a powder keg waiting to ignite.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see so many things that could go wrong in an instant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The most obvious is that teetering stool the boy is standing on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll come crashing down, plate and all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there's the massive puddle of water covering the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is definitely going to slip and fall on that wet surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman herself has one foot right in it, yet she doesn't notice a thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost infuriating how unaware she is of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sheâ€™s so focused on her dish, oblivious to the twin disasters behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All those dishes stacked on the counter near the sink could easily get knocked over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really anticipate a cascade of accidents in the next few moments.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of negligence is quite startling to observe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disaster waiting to happen, truly.
segments.speaker: PAR
